name: Amsys
overview:
Amsys is the UK’s largest Apple authorised Service Provider and Europe’s no1 Apple Authorised Training Centre. Principal business services are: Mac Support, Mac Repair, System Integration and Consultancy, iOS Devices in Business and specialist technical recruitment.

Their training venues are located in Surrey,London and Manchester and they offer the full range of Apple certified OS X Technical Training Courses. Their specialist and experienced trainers will ensure that the benefits students gain will make them stand out from the crowd. Their training is fully guaranteed to make sure you get the best training experience and value.

The Mac Support centre provides professional, bespoke Mac Support services to users and organisations of all sizes. Their range of services extends from single Mac repairs to responsive contract maintenance options, which are designed to help enterprises, the educational sector and small business who seek a high quality support solution that provides value for money. A dedicated helpdesk is structured to handle all level of technical query and offer remote access assistance.

As one of the lead mac support companies Amsys is a member of the apple consultants network and plans and conducts deployment and integration projects for customers of all sizes.

Amsys has over 20 years experience as a key player in the Apple computer market making them an ideal recruitment service as they have unrivalled understanding of the range of Mac and cross platform issues that can affect a businesses performance and processes. This is what gives Amsys the edge as they recognize which technical staff will suit the right positions.

Amsys is launching a mobile Division to help businesses develop in a mobile environment. Services include iPhone App development, developer recruitment, supporting andn deploying iOS devices in business and developer training.
